greeting.question: Main menu
greeting.answer:
WELCOME TO ROSE CHEMICALS. THANK YOU FOR CONTACTING US, PLEASE LET US KNOW HOW WE MAY ASSIST YOU. PLEASE SELECT BELOW

1. PRODUCT KIT
2. TRAINING VIDEOS
3. READY TO USE CHEMICALS
4. CLEANING PRODUCTS
5. ORDERING
6. PAYMENTS
7. DELIVERY
8. CONTACT INFORMATION & SUPPORT
9. ONLINE TECHNICAL TRAINING & SAFETY
10. WORKING HOURS

product_kits.question: What product kits do you have?
product_kits.answer:
ROSE CHEMICALS SUPPLIES A WIDE RANGE OF CLEANING PRODUCT KIT WITH FORMULATION LISTED BELOW:

1. FABRIC CONDITIONER KIT 1:20/Rs 1100
2. LIQUID DETERGENT - ULTRA KIT 1:25/ Rs 1600
3. LIQUID DETERGENT - SMART KIT 1:55/ Rs 2000
4. DISH WASH LIQUID - ULTRA KIT 1:20/ Rs 1200
5. DISH WASH LIQUID - SMART KIT 1:55/ Rs 2000
6. FLOOR CLEANER - ULTRA KIT 1:20/ Rs 1100
7. FLOOR CLEANER - SMART KIT 1:55 / Rs 2000
8. SOAP OIL KIT 1:50 / Rs 700
9. GLASS CLEANER KIT 1:20
10. TOILET BOWL CLEANER 1:50
11. ROOM FRESHENER KIT 1:20 / Rs 350
12. PHENYL COMPOUND KIT 1:20/ Rs 200
13. PHENYL COMPOUND KIT 1:30/ Rs 300
14. PHENYL COMPOUND KIT 1:50/ Rs 400

product_kits.question: What is the price of your fabric conditioner kit, and how many litres can be manufactured and what would the cost per liter?
product_kits.answer: PRICE OF OUR FABRIC CONDITIONER KIT IS RS 1100, YOU CAN MAKE 20 LITRES OF FABRIC CONDITIONER AND THE COST OF THE FABRIC CONDITIONER PER LITRE WILL BE RS 55/-

product_kits.question: How can I manufacture, I am new to this field?
product_kits.answer: DON'T WORRY, WE WILL GIVE YOU STEP BY STEP GUIDANCE IN A PDF FILE AND ALSO A MANUFACTURING VIDEO WITH VOICE SO EVERYONE CAN UNDERSTAND.

product_kits.question: Do you give any personal assistance?
product_kits.answer: OF COURSE, YOU CAN CALL OUR SUPPORT TEAM AND GET PERSONAL ASSISTANCE DURING OFFICE HOURS

product_kits.question: Can I get samples?
product_kits.answer: GOOD, WE CAN PROVIDE AS READY TO USE PRODUCT IF YOU ARE CONVINCED WITH THAT THEN YOU CAN TRY OUT KIT.

product_kits.question: Can I choose any perfume?
product_kits.answer: YES, WE HAVE AROUND 4 FRAGRANCES YOU CAN CHOOSE FROM THAT

product_kits.question: What are the fragrances?
product_kits.answer:
WE OFFER THE FOLLOWING FRAGRANCES:
A. MOMENTS
B. BLOSSOM
C. COMFORT
D. MAGIC

product_kits.question: What is the price of your liquid detergent - ultra kit, and how many litres can be manufactured and what would the cost per liter?
product_kits.answer: PRICE OF OUR LIQUID DETERGENT - ULTRA KIT IS RS 1600, YOU CAN MAKE 25 LITRES OF LIQUID DETERGENT AND THE COST OF LIQUID DETERGENT PER LITRE WILL BE RS 64/-

product_kits.question: How can I manufacture liquid detergent, I am new to this field?
product_kits.answer: DON'T WORRY, WE WILL GIVE YOU STEP BY STEP GUIDANCE IN A PDF FILE AND ALSO A MANUFACTURING VIDEO WITH VOICE SO EVERYONE CAN UNDERSTAND.

product_kits.question: What are the liquid detergent fragrances?
product_kits.answer:
WE OFFER THE FOLLOWING FRAGRANCES FOR LIQUID DETERGENT:
A. ARIEL
B. SURF EXCEL
C. AQUA
D. ZESTY FRESH

product_kits.question: Can I get your product catalogue?
product_kits.answer: Yes. You can download our detailed product catalog by visiting www.rosechemicals.co.in or requesting it via email at rosechemicalsindia@gmail.com.

product_kits.question: Do you supply chemicals alone unlike kit?
product_kits.answer: YES. WE SUPPLY CHEMICALS TO MANUFACTURERS, FRANCHISEES, AND RESELLERS ACROSS INDIA.

product_kits.question: Can you recommend raw materials for my requirements?
product_kits.answer: Absolutely. Our technical team can recommend the most efficient raw materials based on your product requirements and cost considerations.

formulations.question: Do you provide formulations?
formulations.answer: Yes. We provide tried and tested formulations for products like floor cleaners, toilet cleaners, dishwash gels, handwashes, glass cleaners, and more.

formulations.question: Can you customize formulations?
formulations.answer: Yes. We can adjust fragrance, concentration, color, and performance to suit your specific market or customer demand.

formulations.question: Do you provide technical training for formulations?
formulations.answer: Yes. We provide full technical training for our franchisees, including formulation and production guidance.

formulations.question: What documentation do you provide for formulations?
formulations.answer: We provide a detailed process sheet, raw material list, and recommended usage guidelines for every formulation.

formulations.question: Do you help with product labels and branding?
formulations.answer: Yes. We assist with product labels, branding, and packaging designs for franchise partners.

franchise.question: How can I apply for a franchise?
franchise.answer: You can apply by visiting www.rosechemicals.co.in or contacting us directly at +91 8610570490 for franchise enrollment assistance.

franchise.question: What do franchisees receive?
franchise.answer: Franchisees receive raw materials, formulations, branding support, training, marketing materials, and ongoing technical guidance.

franchise.question: Do you provide regional exclusivity?
franchise.answer: Yes. We provide regional exclusivity based on performance and investment scale.

franchise.question: What is the franchise investment required?
franchise.answer: The investment depends on your region and business scale. Please contact our franchise team for detailed guidance.

franchise.question: Do you help with production setup?
franchise.answer: Yes. We help in setting up the entire production system, including sourcing tools and machinery.

franchise.question: Do you supply cleaning tools?
franchise.answer: Yes. We import and supply high-quality cleaning tools directly from China for our franchise partners.

franchise.question: Do you provide marketing support?
franchise.answer: Yes. We offer marketing materials, digital promotion support, and local advertising templates.

ordering_delivery_payment.question: How can I place an order?
ordering_delivery_payment.answer: You can place orders through WhatsApp, email (rosechemicalsindia@gmail.com), or via our website www.rosechemicals.co.in.

ordering_delivery_payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
ordering_delivery_payment.answer: We accept advance payments via bank transfer, UPI, or other approved methods. Credit terms may apply for regular franchisees.

ordering_delivery_payment.question: How long does delivery take?
ordering_delivery_payment.answer: Delivery generally takes 510 working days depending on product availability and location.

ordering_delivery_payment.question: Do you deliver across India?
ordering_delivery_payment.answer: Yes. We deliver to all major cities and regions across India.

ordering_delivery_payment.question: Do you export products?
ordering_delivery_payment.answer: Yes. We can supply export-ready formulations and products on request.

ordering_delivery_payment.question: Can I track my order?
ordering_delivery_payment.answer: Yes. Once dispatched, tracking details are shared via WhatsApp or email.

ordering_delivery_payment.question: Can I get a quotation?
ordering_delivery_payment.answer: Yes. Please share your product list and quantity to receive a formal quotation.

training_safety.question: Do you conduct training sessions?
training_safety.answer: Yes. We conduct hands-on and online training sessions covering product formulation, production, and business management.

training_safety.question: Do you provide Safety Data Sheets?
training_safety.answer: Yes. Safety Data Sheets are available for all products supplied by Rose Chemicals.

training_safety.question: What safety precautions should I take?
training_safety.answer: Always wear gloves, a mask, and protective gear. Avoid direct skin contact and ensure adequate ventilation.

training_safety.question: Do you provide technical support?
training_safety.answer: Yes. Our technical support team assists with process improvements and troubleshooting.

training_safety.question: Are your products compliant with safety standards?
training_safety.answer: Yes. Our products comply with national and international chemical safety standards.

training_safety.question: Do you offer ongoing support?
training_safety.answer: Yes. We offer ongoing technical and formulation support to all clients and franchisees.

contact_information.question: What is your address?
contact_information.answer: No.179, First Street, Tagore Nagar, Tiruppalai, Madurai  625014, Tamil Nadu, India.

contact_information.question: Is this WhatsApp number your official contact?
contact_information.answer: Yes. This WhatsApp number (+91 8610570490) is our official business contact.

contact_information.question: Can I request a callback?
contact_information.answer: Yes. Please provide your name, phone number, and query. Our representative will contact you shortly.

contact_information.question: Do you have distributors?
contact_information.answer: Yes. We have authorized distributors and franchisees across multiple regions in India.

working_hours.question: What are your working hours?
working_hours.answer: We operate from Monday to Saturday, 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM.

working_hours.question: Are you open on Sundays?
working_hours.answer: Our office remains closed on Sundays and national holidays.

working_hours.question: Can I send queries after working hours?
working_hours.answer: Yes. You can send your queries anytime, and our team will respond during business hours.

general.question: Can I get samples?
general.answer: Yes. Samples are available for selected formulations upon request.

general.question: Can I visit your office?
general.answer: Yes. Visits can be scheduled in advance by contacting our office.

general.question: Do you provide certificates?
general.answer: Yes. We provide required certificates for products as applicable.

general.question: Do you offer private labeling?
general.answer: Yes. We provide private labeling and OEM support for interested partners.

general.question: Do you supply cleaning equipment?
general.answer: Yes. We import and supply professional-grade cleaning tools and equipment for industrial use.
